name: j14updates
author: Edo Frenkel \ Tailor Vijay \ Ido Schacham \ Lior Zur

sections.description:
Official widget for j14.org.il, the Israeli Tent Movement for social justice. Calls blog viewers to support the struggle via three links to j14.org.il:

  1. Get Updated – Sign up for for weekly newsletter and/or immediate updates
  2. Volunteer – Fill in a volunteer form
  3. Donate – Donate money via official channels. The widget will smartly resize itself to fit in your sidebar. Minimum width: 100px.
sections.installation:
1. Download the file ‘j14-updates.zip’
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress

  3. Go to Widgets and drag-drop the widget to the relevant widget area Manually:

  4. Upload j14-updates folder to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory

  5. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  6. Go to Widgets and drag-drop the widget to the relevant widget area
sections.changelog:
1.2

  • JS bugfix

1.1.2

  • Bugfix – CSS

1.1.1

  • Bugfix – converted textual files to unix format

1.1

  • Updated graphics
  • Smaller buttons
  • Support for narrow sidebars
  • Plugin download link below the widget
